Description: Description Thank you for visiting my auction!You are bidding on a used but in very good condition, authentic, Maurice Lacroix Pontos Day & Date Silver Dial Automatic Mens Watch ref. PT 6158, Stainless steel case, Fixed bezel. Siver dial with silver-tone hands and index hour markers. Minute markers around the inner ring. Dial Type: Analog. Day and date. Automatic movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Case diameter: 40 mm. Case thickness: 12.35 mm. Round case shape. Deployment clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: date, day, hour, minute, second. This watch is owned by my friend who wants to sell it, i have checked the watch it works properly no isuues, the watch have some scratches but nothing extreme, comes with 2 used leather bands in good condition!!1 band is Maurice Lacroix and 1 is aftermarket. The watch comes without box and papers Please consider the pictures as a part of the description, please. If you have any concerns, contact me so I could answer all your questions. I truly believe that it’s better to clarify everything before bidding in order not be disappointed after receiving the watch.The watch is guaranteed 100% authentic or your full money back. Payment & Shipping We accept PayPal payment only. Ships via EMS to Worldwide (40$). Only for European Union countries will be shipped via DHL - 40$ (up 3 working days to your door). Sorry for hight cost of shipping but i prefer the DHL for expensive watches becuase it is very safety and fast, with minimal risk. No taxes for European Union countries. All the customs charges and taxes are under buyer’s responsibility, but under buyer request can assist to exclude any of this. The durations of shipping for European Union are just estimate in 2-3 business days, for USA in 5-10 business days, rest of the world 10-14 working days. It may take longer depending on location, custom clearance and traffic condition.Please contact us first if you have any problems with your purchase before opening a case. We will solve the problem immediately. Returns Accepted depends on case, if it is our fault we will full refund you.
Title: Maurice Lacroix Pontos Day & Date Silver Dial Automatic Mens Watch ref. PT 6158

ReturnPolicy.Description:
I return the money in the following conditions: 
The packet didn't go to the destination; 
I return the whole account of money, after the post office makes the necessary research and finds out that the packet has been lost.
In other situations: I will try to propose acceptable conditions for both.
